thread.title: A Spanish billionaire just overthrew Bill Gates to become the richest man in the world
thread.title_full: A Spanish billionaire just overthrew Bill Gates to become the richest man in the world

author: From businessinsider.com
title: A Spanish billionaire just overthrew Bill Gates to become the richest man in the world
text: From businessinsider.com There's a new richest man in the world. It's Spanish clothes magnate Amancio Ortega, who has overtaken Microsoft founder Bill Gates for the first time ever. According to Forbes' real-time tracker, the elusive multi-billionaire founder of European clothes retailer Zara just smashed past Bill Gates to become the wealthiest person on the planet, with a fortune of $79.8 billion (71.83 billion or £51.84 billion). The elusive Ortega isn't as much of a household name as Gates, but he's quietly ascended the wealth rankings in recent years, as his company continues to perform well and expand.
